MCP (Model Context Protocol) is much more than a protocol for connecting AI agents to tools â€” it acts as a knowledge design layer that organizes, shares, and reuses an organization's technical domain through tool endpoints, resources, and prompts, transforming knowledge into intelligent infrastructure.
